skillTree.localised_description: The steeds of Chaos are vicious mounts enveloped in thick plate barding - coal-black chargers infused with Daemon blood and a temperament to match.
As part of the binding ritual, Screamer bodies are flattened and transmuted into unlikely aspects.
The Warriors of Chaos are the playthings of Gods and given many gifts, including formidable fighting skills.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
Standing face to face with your enemy means getting to watch the light fade from their eyes when you win.
A leader is needed on the field of battle, able to rally the forces of Chaos in even the most dire situations.
Every dark army requires a particularly twisted mind, capable of thinking three steps ahead of the enemy.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: Champions of Tzeentch are amongst the most magically attuned of all Chaos Champions and Chaos Lords, warriors that combine the raw brute strength of the tribes of the Northmen with the magical powers of Chaos itself.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: The power Tzeentch, the Chaos God of change and intrigue, grants his Champions allows them to become masters of magic, which mixed with their skill in combat, makes them truly powerful foes.

The Champions of Tzeentch are brightly adorned, with crests and elaborate capes and panoply, their Chaos Armour is decorated in dazzling colours, inlaid with bands of gold and bluish-silver and constructed from strangely curving components.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional -3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Oh, horrific wonder! Vile awe! Such hateful majesty!
The champion is surrounded by crackling flames that burn his enemies whilst leaving his own body untouched.
Fatigue is no issue when one is driven by the darkest rage imaginable.
Those blessed by Chaos see not only what is before them, but also what lurks in shadow, hiding in the periphery.
The champion has been rewarded with a hideous appearance, grotesque enough to wither the hearts of men.
Granted skin as strong as iron plate, there is little that can penetrate the champion's defences.
The champion's skin is covered with a thousand reptilian scales, each as tough as Dragonhide.
Enemies break like brittle twigs beneath the onslaught of such overwhelming strength.

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 10% casualties inflicted

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some are blessed by a dark understanding, able to gleam knowledge from every experience.
A foe may strike fast, but those evolved by Chaos move faster still.
The champion can channel the dark strength flowing through his veins to deliver a single blow that can shatter a fortress wall.
